title: Family Group
creator_credit: Rodney Musch, Norman Laird and Dept of Film Production for the Dept of Agriculture
brief_description: A sheep dog eats part of a dead sheep and spreads hydatid infection to a farmer’s family. Stresses need for constant vigilance against hydatids.
creator_credit_for_label: Rodney Musch, Norman Laird and Dept of Film Production for the Dept of Agriculture
